ygData.subject: RE: Freeport/Queens Faction Question
ygData.msgSnippet: no but you can loot them off an npc corpse whether or not you or your party killed them
ygData.messageBody:
no but you can loot them off an npc corpse whether or not you or your party
killed them

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Ryugen Lee [SMTP:ryugen47@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, September 14, 1999 4:48 PM
> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Freeport/Queens Faction Question
>
> From: "Ryugen Lee" <ryugen47@...>
>
> You can't loot NODROP items off someone else's corpse.
>
>
> >From: LBuddah13@...
> >Reply-To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> >To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> >Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Freeport/Queens Faction Question
> >Date: Mon, 13 Sep 1999 15:45:02 EDT
> >
> >From: LBuddah13@...
> >
> >I thought of a way to get the guild note of a freeport monk, I do not
> know
> >if
> >it works but it is worth a try. What you do is create a freeport monk
> >bring
> >him to the newbie zone and fight an orc, let the orc kill you. Then when
>
> >you
> >go back to your bind point consent your quenos monk, then log on with
> your
> >quenos monk and loot the corpse. If it works it should give you the guild
> >note.
